name: 2022 3rd Asia Conference on Renewable Energy And Environmental Engineering（AREEE 2022）
content: Publication： Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and IJESD editorial board, accepted papers will be recommended to International Journal of Environmental Science and Development for publication in a special issue, which will be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
